meanings.definition: Of very poor quality or the lowest standard.
meanings.sent1: The old car in the junkyard was the cruddiest vehicle there.
meanings.sent2: The cruddiest pencil in the pack kept breaking while I was writing.
meanings.sent3: Even the cruddiest sandwich would taste better than this burnt toast.
meanings.sent4: Her cruddiest painting was still better than my best attempt at art.
meanings.sent5: The cruddiest toy in the store had missing parts and chipped paint.

meanings.definition: The superlative form of 'cruddy', meaning covered in or resembling dirt or filth.
meanings.sent1: After playing outside, his clothes were the cruddiest in the laundry pile.
meanings.sent2: The dog's fur was the cruddiest after rolling in the mud.
meanings.sent3: The cruddiest shoes at the party were actually a fashion statement.
meanings.sent4: The cruddiest room in the house looked like a tornado had passed through.
meanings.sent5: The cruddiest dish in the sink had dried food stuck to it.
